description: Primitive roots that go with the primes in A002230.
references: N. J. A. Sloane, A Handbook of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1973 (includes this sequence).
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
A. E. Western and J. C. P. Miller, Tables of Indices and Primitive Roots. Royal Society Mathematical Tables, Vol. 9, Cambridge Univ. Press, 1968, p. XLIV.
links: A. E. Western and J. C. P. Miller, Tables of Indices and Primitive Roots, Royal Society Mathematical Tables, Vol. 9, Cambridge Univ. Press, 1968 [Annotated scans of selected pages]
mathematica: s = {1}; rm = 1; Do[p = Prime[k]; r = PrimitiveRoot[p]; If[r > rm, Print[r]; AppendTo[s, r]; rm = r], {k, 10^6}]; s (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Apr 05 2011 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
